_sText:
Ok i created this today and just like playing deathrun, but their arent that many detailed dr maps and so i made this one and tried to keep the trapps as realistic as posible, {bridge exploding} but i needed some more traps so i added the electricity comming off the pipes and stuff, if anyone has any good realistic ideas for a new trap for this map i would love to hear, i have not been able to test the dammage on the map and everthing but it should all be good :D i allso used a fan from fibbs prefab pack :D ty its sexy so just tell me what you think, i am thinking about making another version where after a period of time instead off all cts being killed, they are teliported to another map with jetpacks and scouts and same as the ts :P but i dont know lol ok i added 2 versions to it, version 1 has watter, which causes fps to drop around 40 fps so i made a version 2 without watter and is around 100 fps both included
Watch more video games and play free games at WeGame.
EDIT: ok i changed ALOT to it now :D
